text: Abdul Hadi Zaqlam or simply Howeidi (born 18 June 1991), is a Libyan professional footballer who currently plays for Al-Hilal. ==References== ==External links== * Abdul Hadi Zaqlam at Goalzz.com * Abdul Hadi Zaqlam at Globalsportsarchive.com Category:Libyan footballers Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Libyan expatriate footballers Category:Libyan expatriate sportspeople in Iraq Category:Al-Mina'a SC players Category:Expatriate footballers in Iraq
title: Abdul Hadi Zaqlam
